content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy yoga, and making delicious food for my friends and family.
That's cool. I like to watch foreign films and relax with my band t-shirts.
What kind of foreign films do you like?
I like movies from all over the world, but my favorites are Japanese and Korean films.
I've never seen a Japanese film, but I love Korean films! They're so beautiful and emotional.
Yeah, they're amazing! Have you seen the movie "Oldboy"?
Yes! I loved that movie. It was so intense and well-made.
It's one of my favorites. I also really like the movie "The Handmaiden". It's a Korean film about a woman who becomes a handmaid for a wealthy Japanese man.
I've heard good things about that movie. I'll have to check it out.
I think I will. Thanks for the recommendation!
